ScheduleSystem

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScheduleSystem.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The event entity is a class responsible for the events in the convention. Each instance of an event models a separate event.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • hasAttendee

        public boolean hasAttendee(java.util.UUID userID)
        check the event if an attendee with a specified user id is expected to attend the event
        Parameters:
        userID - the user id of the attendee
        Returns:
        true if and only if the attendee with the specified user id is attending the event

      • removeAttendee

        public boolean removeAttendee(java.util.UUID userID)
        attempt to remove an attendee with a specified user id from the event
        Parameters:
        userID - the user id of the specified attendee
        Returns:
        true if and only if the user with the specified user id is removed from the event

      • hasSpace

        public boolean hasSpace()
        Returns:
        true if and only if the event is not at max capacity
